overview: In this visit with the beloved author and illustrator of Sylvester & the Magic Pebble and Doctor DeSoto, Steig candidly talks about life, art and creating books for children.
tagline: In this visit with the beloved author and illustrator of Sylvester & the Magic Pebble and Doctor DeSoto, Steig candidly talks about life, art and creating books for children.
title: Getting to Know William Steig
